meanings.definition: The state or quality of being full or overflowing with something.
meanings.sent1: The teemingness of the market on a busy Saturday morning was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The teemingness of the forest with wildlife was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The teemingness of the classroom with excited students made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent4: The teemingness of ideas in her mind was like a bursting dam.
meanings.sent5: The teemingness of colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The act of swarming or abounding with a large number of something.
meanings.sent1: The teemingness of bees around the hive was a sign of a healthy colony.
meanings.sent2: The teemingness of tourists in the city center created a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The teemingness of ants on the picnic blanket caused a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The teemingness of stars in the night sky was like a twinkling blanket.
meanings.sent5: The teemingness of bubbles in the fizzy drink made it refreshing.
